import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[isLinked,setIsLinked]=useState(false);const[analyticsData,setAnalyticsData]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{// Check if Instagram is linked here
checkInstagramLink();},[]);const checkInstagramLink=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/instagram/check-link');setIsLinked(response.data.isLinked);if(response.data.isLinked){fetchAnalyticsData();}else{setLoading(false);}}catch(error){console.error('Error checking Instagram link:',error);setError('Error checking Instagram link.');setLoading(false);}};const fetchAnalyticsData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/instagram/analytics');setAnalyticsData(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching analytics data:',error);setError('Failed to fetch analytics data.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleLinkInstagram=()=>{// Logic to link Instagram account
window.location.href='/api/instagram/oauth';};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Instagram Analytics Dashboard"}),!isLinked?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLinkInstagram,children:"Link Instagram Account"}):analyticsData?// Display analytics data
analyticsData.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"analytics-item"},index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No analytics data available."})]});};export default Dashboard;
